quest.name: Ye Wayward Brothers
journal: The Ananta battlemaid is not one to be trifled with.

dialogue.name: ANANTASOLDIER02637
dialogue.text: You look like a ssstrider in sssearch of comrades in need. If ssso, I have a tasssk for you.

dialogue.name: ANANTASOLDIER02637
dialogue.text: I am a trainer, and I was told to expect new recruitsss thisss eveday, yet nary a one has come. Perhapsss they were given the wrong time or location. I do not know.

dialogue.name: ANANTASOLDIER02637
dialogue.text: They number five in all, these would-be warriors. Sssend them unto me, should you chance to find them.

dialogue.name: ANANTASOLDIER
dialogue.text: With time, I can turn even the most haplesss milksssops into whirlwinds of death. But I cannot do thisss if sssaid farmboys do not come.

dialogue.name: SOWASOWAUSOLDIER02637
dialogue.text: Oh bugger, you were sent by the snake, weren't you!? I heard one in four recruits doesn't live through their training. That can't be true, right? Oh bugger, oh bugger...

dialogue.name: SINGANSOLDIER02637
dialogue.text: Ah. A thousand pardons. So preoccupied was I by the question of whether Ala Mhigo should be a monarchy or republic that I neglected to attend my training. How silly, I knowâ”€until we drive the imperials from our lands, the question is moot.

dialogue.name: BRAVESOLDIER02637
dialogue.text: I know, I know. I'm late. But I had to say a prayer for my sister first. After what the imperials did to her, death was a mercy...

dialogue.name: YOUNGSOLDIER02637
dialogue.text: Huh? Training? Gah! I was so busy practicing to impress the others that I completely forgot! Thank you!

dialogue.name: YANGSOLDIER02637
dialogue.text: The teacher calls for me? I see. We were discussing strategies for disabling magitek armor, you see, and... Ah, yes, of course, there is no time. If you would excuse me.

dialogue.name: ANANTASOLDIER02637
dialogue.text: All recruitsss are presssent and accounted for. My thanksss to you, ssstrider.

dialogue.name: ANANTASOLDIER02637
dialogue.text: Not all appreciate the rigor with which I train my recruitsss. Sssome favor a gentler approach. As if the imperials will be ssso kind.

dialogue.name: ANANTASOLDIER02637
dialogue.text: 'Tis a thanklesss job, to teach, sssome sssay. But I sssay their sssurvival is thanksss enough. Fare you well.
